name: Keth
appearance: Lean broker with a smile like a cut and hands inked in ladder maps. Wears a patchwork vest lined with hidden pockets and knife-sheaths.
character: Silver-tongued, careful with knives and promises. Keeps three exits in sight at all times.
skills: Route mapping through ribs and reed
talents: Remembering debts and favors by touchstones
Loosening a rung with one tap
dreams: Place a proxy in the Salt Parliament
Own a legitimate salt basin family by paper
Acquire a key to the Engine for leverage
secrets: Keeps a duplicate ledger hidden in a knot-rope niche in the Lantern
Sold a false map that sent a Warden patrol into mangrove quickmire
Pays temple tithe in someone else's name
